meanings.sent1: The antiskid tires helped the car stay on the road during the rainy day.
meanings.sent2: The antiskid coating on the floor made it safer to walk on.
meanings.sent3: The antiskid shoes made the clown's performance even funnier as he tried to slide comically.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an antiskid barrier, preventing any negative thoughts from slipping in.
meanings.sent5: The antiskid gloves gripped the handle tightly, ensuring a secure hold.

meanings.definition: A substance or device used to prevent skidding
meanings.sent1: The mechanic applied antiskid to the runway to improve aircraft safety.
meanings.sent2: The antiskid on the stairs prevented accidents in the busy office building.
meanings.sent3: The antiskid on the banana peel made slipping on it impossible, much to the disappointment of the prankster.
meanings.sent4: His quick thinking acted as an antiskid, stopping the situation from spiraling out of control.
meanings.sent5: The antiskid spray created a protective layer on the icy sidewalk, making it safer for pedestrians.
